RoboTekHost.com ★ Grand Opening Special: Up to 50% OFF ALL Shared Plans! ★

ABOUT US
RoboTekHost is a new privately-owned web hosting provider that provides shared web hosting and virtual private servers at competitive prices without compromising quality and reliability.

GRAND OPENING SPECIAL
We have just launched our site and with months of planing and hard work, we are now open for business!
To get us established we are going to offer everyone the following promotions:
Promo 1: DEAL
25% OFF per month for the next 12 months. This only applies to the Premium, Advanced & Business Plans.
Click to expand...

Promo 2: DOUBLEDEAL
50% OFF your first invoice with the greatest savings on a year term. This applies to all plans.
Click to expand...

WHY CHOOSE RoboTekHost?
Everyone one at some point will offer great deals, even ridiculous ones where there is no chance of sustainability or growth, however we believe quality and exceptional support will out shine the competition and keep you at ease by trusting in us to deliver what you pay for.
We are heavily invested into our business and now you, the potential client by providing expert service and great customer relations.
A happy client is a permanent client.

Other than the reason above we also have some rather kickass deals and features that will prove to be a step up above the competition.
Here are some of our features and additional reasons to let us host you!
  • There are NO Contracts, NO Catch, NO hidden fees, What you see is what you pay and we do provide discounts for longer terms!
  • 30 day money back guarantee!
  • cPanel with 400+ Softaculous Script Installers
  • We utilize Cloudlinux for stability and security, never will a runaway script or high load slow or shut your site down!
  • FREE SitePade Website Builder. Drag and drop then publish to your domain!
  • FREE JetBackup cPanel plugin. We provide remote daily incremental backups with 10 days retention that you can access directly from your cPanel, either restore your full website or just partial files, mysql databases, DNS zones, Emails or Cron Jobs
  • Host Unlimited Domains, Sub Domains, MySQL Databases, FTP Accounts, Email Accounts and Email Lists
  • Multiple PHP versions with customize-able PHP Extensions & php.ini Settings (5.3 ,5.4, 5.5, 5.6, 7.0 & 7.1)
  • Free SSL powered by Let's Encrypt
  • FREE DDoS Protection
  • INSTANT SETUP & ACTIVATION! Get started on your website right away!
  • 24/7 Help Desk Support, we also offer live chat when available.
